name: Computer Lab
description: Women's Building's computer lab offers the following: - Free computer use - Printer and photocopy machine - Scanner - Tech Lab Learn how to: - Create an email account - Upload and send documents and photos - Navigating the internet - Learn basic computer skills - Get skilled in job search through our new program One Step Forward. - Typing - Use a smartphone - Email basics Monday - Wednesday 10 AM-4 PM (closed 12-1 PM) ‍

howToGetIt: Send email to resourceroom@womensbuilding.org or just drop in to book your spot.
